EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_DE_Digital Transformation Forum_Q216.Invite - English (send 5-25-16)
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/de/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> Pivotal, EMC, Mimacom, Hexad, and FME are excited to invite you to the Digital Transformation Forum <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> held in Frankfurt on June 8th 2016.
Join us and listen to Dr. Willms Buhse <[[http://willmsbuhse.com/profil/]]>, one of Europeâ€™s leading speakers on Agile and Digital Transformation, talk about the trends and outlook for digital disruption in the German market.
Learn too how Allianz, Volkswagen, Fraport, and other leading German companies are transforming their organisations to become work at start-up speeds and drive new business models.
The Digital Transformation Forum is sponsored by Pivotal, EMC, Mimacom, Hexad, and FME.
Date: June 8th 2016 Time : 9h00 to 16h30 Location: Hilton Frankfurt Airport Hotel
Register now as space is limited. This is an exclusive event.
REGISTER NOW <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]>
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team
